ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] patch message
ygData.msgSnippet: nothing will happen unless a guide gets a petition about it.  (in which case, since his name pre-dates fabian s existance the name SHOULD be left alone)  Then
ygData.messageBody:
nothing will happen unless a guide gets a petition about it. (in which
case, since his name pre-dates fabian's existance the name SHOULD be left
alone) Then there is a chance that an over-zealous GM or Guide may make the
guy change his name (See parenthesied text if you wanna warn this guy how to
deal with the situation should that happen)

I was a senior in the guide program for a very long time. The "RULEZ" state
that players may not have the names of significant characters in the
EverQuest environment. But since the player's name pre-dates Fabian he
SHOULD be grandfathered.

CIAO!!!!
----- Original Message -----
From: "Webber, Jessica" <webber@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 11:07 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] patch message


> > From: Bill Costlow [mailto:atlatyl@...]
> > *Quest Fixes*
> >
> > - Fixed the "Minotaur Horns" Quest
> > ***snip***
> > - Fixed the "Travis Twostring" quest.
> > - The Fleshy Orb quest and "Fabian" should
> > really be fixed now. These were not correct after
> > the last patch due to a data export issue.
>
> Hmmm, there's a character on my server named Fabian. Any idea what will
> happen now that the real Fabian will be in the world?
>
> Peace
> Evulia, bard of 11 missed notes, Tunare
